boardrelated

Class buyableSquare

  • java.lang.Object
    • boardrelated.Square
      • boardrelated.buyableSquare
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Auctionable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    cabSquare, deedSquare, RailroadTrackSquare, utilitySquare

    public abstract class buyableSquare
extends Square
implements Auctionable
    This class as the sub-type of Squares allows us progress in a manner that the users can buy, sell, mortgage and build constructions on squares. It allows us to use a declared behavior of buyable properties in many different ways such as utilities, deeds, cabs etc.
    Author:
    Cem Uyuk

      • buyableSquare

        public buyableSquare(java.lang.String name,
                     int squareNumber,
                     int trackNumber,
                     int colorID,
                     int totalPlayers,
                     int price,
                     int rent)
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the square.
        squareNumber - The number of the square which is sort of tag.
        trackNumber - Number of the track that this class' instance is on.
        colorID - Color Identification number of this class' instance.
        totalPlayers - The number of total players on its instance.
        price - The cost of this class' instance.
        rent - The rent of this class' instance when someone arrives.

      • getRecWorth

        Returns:

      • build

        public void build(int i)
        Builds house, hotel and skyscraper according to the need.
        Parameters:
        i - The input integer that describes what is asked to build.
        Requires:
        Owner to have enough money., The all color group to be owned by the same player and be in the same construction level.
        Modifies:
        The buyable deed that it has construction.

      • mortgageOrRemove

        public void mortgageOrRemove(int i)
        Removes/Mortgages buyable, depot, house, hotel, skyscraper or stand according to the calling parameter. When a construction is removed, the deed does not get mortgaged. But it decreases to a lower level.
        Parameters:
        i - The input integer that describes what is asked to mortgage.
        Requires:
        The buyable to have an owner.
        Modifies:
        The buyableSquare's situation such as mortgaged, hasHouse, hasHotel etc. according to what is removed.

      • hurricaneOnOneSquare

        public void hurricaneOnOneSquare(int i)
        Allows players to use hurricane cards in a color group to destroy a level of consturction.
        Parameters:
        i - Describes what is going to be destroyed in the hurricane.
        Requires:
        A player to have hurricane card.
        Modifies:
        The situation of a buyable square. For instance, decreases the construction level etc.
        Effects:
        The game flow.
